item.title: Cmder changing the lambda - update!
item.description:
So previously discussed cmder before: [Cmder - Changing the Lambda]({{ site.baseurl }}{% post_url 2016-05-04-cmder-lambda %})

However, with the newest releace of Cmder there were some file structure changes that were made that need to be updated for fixing the lambda.

item.title: Cmder Lambda
item.description: So I have to say, I’m just enamored with Cmder It’s phenomenal. Elegant, clean, and just truly the best console application I’ve used. Throw it in a dropbox and you’re _set. _SSH, git, grep… all my *nix aliases in one portable package? Sure thing - I’m sold. And it’s pretty. Let’s customize it a teeny, tiny bit. I wont re-write the featureset, so:
